Breadth-First.Explanation: General clue collection without a specific location hypothesis.
Gathering visual details and forming a broad hypothesis of France.

Depth-First.KeyElement: Hypothesis: Capitole de Toulouse; verifying facade via street views.
Depth-First.Explanation: Verifying a specific location hypothesis by cross-referencing detailed images.

Depth-First.KeyElement: Confirmation of data points: inscription, flags, brickwork.
Depth-First.Explanation: Finalizing and confirming all specific clues to solidify the hypothesis.

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: The reasoning shifts from broad clue gathering to verifying a specific location hypothesis.
